author: vors
body:
Resolves errors during dotnet cli install that started appear in master, i.e.
https://ci.appveyor.com/project/PowerShell/powershell/build/0.2.0.2013

It didn't affected the whole install, probably because of appveyor cache.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: If we wanted, they're hosting the RC2 version on microsoft.com. They have updated [install for Windows](https://www.microsoft.com/net/core#windows) instructions.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @vors looks like it's not getting the private key?

comments.author: vors

title: dotnet team changed their script name, change our bootstrap
